title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Joel Klatt on USC to B1G, Baker Trade with Mike Silver, 'Sharp or Square' Week 1 Bets
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Joel Klatt on USC to B1G, Baker Trade with Mike Silver, 'Sharp or Square' Week 1 Bets
description:
This is Prime Cuts! The best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast. First, (3:00) Colin explains why Kyrie to the Lakers makes sense in a crowded LA sports market and the bottom line on the careers of Baker Mayfield and Sam Darnold.

Then, (11:00) FOX Lead College Football analyst Joel Klatt discusses the major repercussions of USC & UCLA joining the Big Ten, and if Notre Dame joining is an inevitability. 

Next, (29:00) longtime NFL writer - and host of the Open Mike podcast - Mike Silver reacts to  Baker Mayfield being dealt to Carolina, if there’s any chance the Niners hold onto Jimmy G as insurance for Trey Lance busting, and if the Bears are already thinking about moving off Justin Fields.

Finally, (52:00) the Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if he's sharp or square with his early Week 1 bets, including the Eagles at Lions, Raiders at Chargers, and Packers at Vikings.

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd 

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
